archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.9.4d: d) use of technology that could be inherently vulnerable or prone to defects (e.g. unproven or unsupported software; or insecure external networks, including the internet)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
